text:

title: Incorporating IL7 receptor alpha signaling in the endodomain of B7H3-targeting chimeric antigen receptor T cells mediates antitumor activity in glioblastoma
Meet the Team
text: Our team consists of highly skilled researchers and students with diverse expertise in biochemistry, computational biology, analytical chemistry and synthetic biology. We are committed to fostering a culture of collaboration, curiosity, and excellence.
